ingredient.name: Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG
ingredient.description: Clinically proven probiotic strain with extensive research for digestive health

microbiome_effects.mechanism: Enhances Bifidobacterium through lectin-like proteins and biofilm formation
Pili proteins inhibit pathogen adhesion and preserves epithelial integrity

metabolic_effects.mechanism: Increases IL-10 and IL-12 in macrophages while reducing inflammatory markers

symptom_effects.population_notes: Reduces antibiotic-associated diarrhea by 43% and acute diarrhea duration by 1.1 days

citations.title: Thirty Years of Research on Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG
